All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
HelpMojo
Display help information on i18n-maven-plugin.
Call mvn i18n:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
I18nReader
Reads i18n resources from source file.
JsonI18nReader
Reads i18n resources from JSON files.
JsonUtil
Helper methods for JSON handling.
PropertiesI18nReader
Reads i18n resources from Java properties files.
TransformMojo
Transform i18n resources in Java Properties, JSON or XML file format to Sling i18n Messages JSON or XML format.
XmlI18nReader
Reads i18n resources from XML files.
